Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: David Elmore
Reviews.Content: I got this to record my pool it's doing fine after a month. I have it positioned about 35 feet away from a 24 foot round pool and we can see everything wellI like the zoom and focus they are easy to adjust good picture night and day

ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E, Color DSP. High resolution: 700 TV lines
IR illuminators: 65 LEDs for night vision. Lens: 4-9mm Varifocal Lens, 3X Zoom Lens. Minimum illumination: 0.0 Lux (IR LED on)
Weather resistance: IP66 certification for protection against dust and harsh environment
Cable management design: concealed wiring inside of bracket to protect the camera from vandalism
Package included: 1 of SONY CCD camera, 1 of power supply, 1 x Pre-Amp mini microphone, 1 of audio video power extension cable, 1 of security warning Decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Day Night 700TVL IP66 Outdoor Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E DSP 4-9mm 3X Zoom Lens 65 IR Leds for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance with Mini Audio Microphone, Power Supply and Audio Video Power Extension Cable CKB
